name: Pongquetball
description:
Pongquetball is a very simple Pong clone. I made it as a way to start learning the basics of video game development and the MonoGame framework. I'm putting it up here for free just because I'm proud of it. It's a little buggy, but it works. :)

CONTROLS
Up/Down Arrow Keys - change menu selection, move right paddle
W/S - move left paddle
P - pause game
Esc - exit

Requires .NET 4.5 or higher
